```{r setup}
library(pathomove)
```

```{r}
# some setup
genmax <- 10L
g_patho_init <- genmax / 2
initial_infections <- 5L
tmax = 100
popsize = 100
scenario = 1

microbenchmark::microbenchmark(
  simple_case = run_pathomove(
    scenario = scenario,
    popsize = popsize,
    initialInfections = initial_infections,
    tmax = tmax,
    genmax = genmax,
    g_patho_init = g_patho_init
  )
)
```
